title: Patch Size
body: Riot, what's with the 1+gb patch downloads? Previously, the highest used to be like 500 MB. Really, what's going on?

replies.body: Have you updated your client as of recent? We did have a visual issue last Patch that made it seem the patch was WAYYYY bigger than it actually was. If your Client isn't patching okay though make sure to let me know so I can get you fixed up and back in the game.
